#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
ll a[1000000];
 
ll gcd(ll a, ll b) {
	if(b == 0) return a;
	gcd(b, a % b);
}
 
 
 
int main() {
	ll k, n;
	scanf("%lld %lld",&k,&n);
	for(int i =0 ; i < k; i++) {
		scanf("%lld",&a[i]); 
	}
	ll l = 0;
	ll r = 1e15;
	ll ans = 0;
	ll t = 500;
	while(t--) {
		ll mid = (l + r) / 2;
		ll pices = 0;
		for(int i = 0 ; i < k; i++) {
			pices += mid / a[i];
		}
		if(pices >= n) {
			r = mid - 1;
			ans = mid;
		} else {
			l = mid + 1;
		}
 	}
 	cout<<ans<<"\n";
	return 0;
}
